.entry-header
BAYFRONT PARK EVENTS
BAYFRONT PARK EVENTS
Events
Looking for something to do today, tonight, this weekend? At Bayfront Park and Maurice a Ferre Park you can always find something fun for you or the whole family. Outdoor concerts, free yoga classes, holiday parties, and more.  Check in often as we’re always adding new events.
For information on hiring events, contact SANTRAVIA BUTLER
sbutler@miamigov.com

Park operating hours from
7:00 am to 11:00
pm daily.
Office Hours: Monday to Friday from 9:00 AM to 5:30 PM, closed on Saturdays and Sundays Unless there is a Special Event

.entry-header
BOARD OF TRUSTEES
The Bayfront Park Management Trust was created in 1987, by the Miami City Commission, to manage Bayfront Park “for the purpose of insuring maximum community utilization and enjoyment.” The Trust also manages Maurice A. Ferré Park. The nine (9) member board is led by our Chairman and Commissioner Miguel Angel Gabela.
All Board meetings are open to the public. Meeting agendas can be viewed on this page approximately one week ahead of time and are subject to change.
